name: Ruff 'N Tuff
description:
Overview

You play as Sir Dogg, a Knight on a mission to recover money stolen by bandits. Collect as many coins as you can and return home!

Each time you play, the level is randomly generated!

Mechanics
  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • LMB and Drag to pick up rocks and move them
Process

When generating a level, there are a few possible places where a tile can spawn.  Whichever one of the five tiles spawns are randomized!

Credits

Assets from Unity Store:

  • Dog Knight PBR Polyart
  • Free Low Poly Nature Forest
  • FREE Skybox Extended Shader
  • HYPEPOLY - Isometric Tiles Standart Lite
MAGES Institute of Excellence

Ruff 'N Tuff was developed over a 6 week period by DGDT Valerie Yeo as part of the Algorithms, Mathematics and Physics Module.
